messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] Heaven Under Earth
messages.msgSnippet: Here is a list of movies and tv jidai geki I have collected over the years. Unfortunately most of these I think are not available outside Japan. Sorry also
messages.messageBody:
Here is a list of movies and tv jidai geki I have collected over the years.
Unfortunately most of these I think are not available outside Japan. Sorry
also about the raw way I have set it up but its a work in progress.
----- Original Message -----
From: C Scamm <ovenboy@...>
To: <samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, July 25, 2002 4:48 AM
Subject: Re: [samuraihistory] Heaven Under Earth


>
> Try Ran.
>
> >From: "squrpio_prince" <squrpio_prince@...>
> >Reply-To: samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com
> >To: samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com
> >Subject: [samuraihistory] Heaven Under Earth
> >Date: Wed, 24 Jul 2002 04:09:08 -0000
> >
> >
> >
> > Hey.
> >
> >I live in U.S. and I love the samurai. I can't stop learning about
> >them. I just watchd a movie called Heaven Under Earth witch is an
> >awesome battle movie. Between the Takeda and somebody else in the
> >1550's. I wondered if there are any other great samuria movies that
> >take place in the 16th or 17th century that show some classic
> >battles?
> >
> >
>

messages.subject: Heaven Under Earth
messages.msgSnippet: Hey. I live in U.S. and I love the samurai. I can t stop learning about them. I just watchd a movie called Heaven Under Earth witch is an awesome battle movie.
messages.messageBody:
Hey.

I live in U.S. and I love the samurai. I can't stop learning about
them. I just watchd a movie called Heaven Under Earth witch is an
awesome battle movie. Between the Takeda and somebody else in the
1550's. I wondered if there are any other great samuria movies that
take place in the 16th or 17th century that show some classic
battles?
